section.name: Java Monitoring properties
section.source:
#Class to use for logging MeasurePoint measurepoint.logger.class=net.kernevez.performance.log.AsynchroneJdbcLogger
#Only for XmlFileLogger xml.logger.dir = d:/temp/log
#Allow the logging of the parameters during the method calls log.parameter.defaultvalue = true
#Date & Time configuration for user rendered format.ihm.date=dd/MM/yy format.ihm.time=HH:mm:ss.SSS
#Server name server.name=Babasse
### AsynchroneJdbcLogger configuration for mySql #MySql driver class jdbc.driver.class=com.mysql.jdbc.Driver jdbc.url=jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/monitoring jdbc.user=root jdbc.password=mysql #Sleep time (milliseconds) when the AsynchroneJdbcLogger has no MeasurePoint to Log. asynchronejdbclogger.sleeptime=1000 #Max number of MeasurePoint to log at each cycle asynchronejdbclogger.maxpercycle=10
### Color (RGB) for GroupRendering #WHITE = 255, 255, 255 #LIGHT_GRAY = 192, 192, 192 #GRAY = 128, 128, 128 #DARK_GRAY = 64, 64, 64 #BLACK = 0, 0, 0 #RED = 255, 0, 0 #PINK = 255, 175, 175 #ORANGE = 255, 200, 0 #YELLOW = 255, 255, 0 #GREEN = 0, 255, 0 #MAGENTA = 255, 0, 255 #CYAN = 0, 255, 255 #BLUE = 0, 0, 255 ####
